name: Silver Package
features: Access to all standard gym facilities
Discounted rates on personal training sessions

name: Gold Package
features: Full access to all gym facilities, including premium areas
Unlimited access to group fitness classes
In-depth fitness assessment and personalized workout plan
Discounts on merchandise and additional services

name: Diamond Package
features: VIP access to all gym facilities, including exclusive areas
Unlimited access to all fitness classes, including specialized sessions
Comprehensive fitness assessment, monthly progress tracking, and personalized training plans
Exclusive locker room with additional amenities
Priority booking for all gym services
Special discounts on partner services and events
